answers.answer: My dr just goes straight to the 3hr test as its more accurate. I believe a lot of people fail the I hr one. Try not to stress!
I didnt fail the 2 I took with my daughter so..
Since you only failed by a few points so chances are you'll pass the 3 hour. If u fail then u meet w dietitian and then tedt ur blood sugar levels w diabetic machine several times a day.
The lady who did my test was freaking out. She made it seem really bad that I was off by 9 points

Out of women who fail the 1 hour test I believe only 1 in 3 will fail the 3 hour test. You failed by a small margin, so I'm betting you will pass your 3 hour. My sister scored in the 160 range and passed her 3 hour no problem.
Make sure you do not throw up after you drink the sugar stuff. If you do you have to do ot again another day
I dont have an issue drinking the drinks.

The drink for the 3 hour one is way worse then thr one for the 1 hour one. I failed my 3 hour one so I have gestational diabetes,  which just means for the remander of the pregnancy I cant have a lot of sugar or carbohydrates. But the minute the baby pops ojt I can eat what I want. Its not too bad, the worst is the last week where you are just too tired of being pregnant to care lol.

question: Now what? I know I have to go back and take the 3 hour test which is scheduled for the 22nd of this month! I got a 144 and to pass its supposed to be no higher than a 135. So what happens till I test again? And what if I fail again? This is my second pregnancy! First one didn't have this issue. Has one failed by ten points then pass the 3 hour test?! Im nervous as all get out now! Im 25w1d
